header.title: Jesktop Developer Documentation
header.subtitle: Java Web Start
header.notice: Jesktop documentation is under construction. Everything you can find outside this page is to be considered obsolete.

s1.title: Overview
s1.p: Yes Jesktop apps are compatible with Java Web Start(tm). This excellent Sun Microsystems technology is talked about here: http://www.javasoft.com/products/javawebstart/index.html

s1.title: How?
s1.p: Well it's no different to other Frimble apps. There a jnlp file that shows the packaging for Frimble based apps and it all runs under JWS control.

s1.title: Show me!
s1.p: Well it's very unimpressive. If you must, and after having installed JWS itself, click here to initiate the download of FrimbleDemo3 to JWS's context.
